description: Gets information about a specific association between a queue and a limit.

parameters.name: farmId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the farm that contains the associated queue and limit.

parameters.name: queueId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the queue associated with the limit.

parameters.name: limitId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the limit associated with the queue.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The Unix timestamp of the date and time that the association was created.

nested_items.name: createdBy
nested_items.description: The user identifier of the person that created the association.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The Unix timestamp of the date and time that the association was last updated.

nested_items.name: updatedBy
nested_items.description: The user identifier of the person that last updated the association.

nested_items.name: queueId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the queue associated with the limit.

nested_items.name: limitId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the limit associated with the queue.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status of the limit.
